title: Alquiler de piso en Llucmajor Interior
description:
This charming 110m² apartment features a beautifully landscaped garden, perfect for outdoor relaxation and activities. The home includes two comfortable bedrooms and a modern bathroom, ideal for small families or couples. The open-plan kitchen seamlessly connects to the living area, creating a spacious and inviting atmosphere.

Enjoy the great outdoors with access to tennis courts, a refreshing swimming pool, and a lovely barbecue area, perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying family gatherings. Additionally, the covered terrace provides an ideal spot to unwind while enjoying the surrounding views.

The apartment is fully furnished, ensuring a hassle-free move-in experience. This property is available for rent at €1800 per month, with two months' deposit required. Don't miss this opportunity to live in a beautiful home with fantastic amenities!

2 MONTHS DEPOSIT
WATER IS 55€ PER MONTH ( APPROX. )
WIFI 15€ PER MONTH

GARAGE NOT INCLUDED.
specifications: Cocina equipada y casa sin amueblar
